en.metaOgDescription: Eduardo Marquez is a Software Engineer with a focus on backend development, with practical experience in Linux and MacOS, using languages like Java, TypeScript, and Python.
en.metaDescription: Eduardo Marquez is a Software Engineer with a focus on backend development, with practical experience in Linux and MacOS, using languages like Java, TypeScript, and Python.
en.bio:
Software Engineer @ Parque Mirante.
Bachelor of Computer Science, Universidade Anhembi Morumbi, Graduated in 2022.
en.certAWS: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
en.job0Title: üöß WEB DEVELOPER | AUTOMATION SPECIALIST | PARQUE MIRANTE
en.job0Desc1: Development and maintenance of custom plugins and shortcodes in WordPress to extend functionality and optimize user experience.
en.job0Desc2: Implementation and management of tracking tags and pixels via Google Tag Manager for data analysis and campaign performance measurement.
en.job0Desc3: Creation and optimization of automation flows with n8n for system integration, control, and data visualization.
en.job0Desc4: Technical administration of the WordPress platform, including plugin management, performance, and security.
en.job1Desc1: Complete development of a RESTful API with Strapi (Node.js) to serve as the central backend for web and mobile applications.
en.job1Desc2: Implementation of a CI/CD pipeline for deployment automation, using custom scripts, Bitbucket, AWS CodeCommit, and CodeDeploy for EC2 instances.
en.job1Desc3: Architecture and development of a QR Code generation and validation system integrated with the backend.
en.job1Desc4: Responsible for API integration with multiple clients, ensuring communication between the web platform (frontend) and mobile application.
en.job1Desc5: Development of a mapping and routing system for events, applying graph algorithms (nodes and edges) to calculate optimized routes between points of interest.
en.job2Desc1: Cloud Server Deployment: Deployed servers in cloud environments using AWS EC2 and Amazon RDS, ensuring high availability and scalability of applications;
en.job2Desc2: Process Automation: Implemented CI/CD processes using Docker, automating the development and deployment lifecycle
en.job3Desc1: Led Backend Development: Solely responsible for developing the backend of the ABCasa project, ensuring robust and efficient server-side functionality;
en.job3Desc2: App Integration: Integrated the backend with the ABCasa app, facilitating seamless communication between the app and the server;
en.job3Desc3: Deployment: Successfully deployed the app to both the Google Play Store and Apple App Store, ensuring a smooth user experience across different platforms.
en.job4Desc1: Integration and development of APIs with Fastify (Node) and Flask (Python).
en.job4Desc2: Software development with artificial intelligence for the Anna robot project.
en.job4Desc6: Task automation with bash and Python.
en.job4Desc8: Cloud experience with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon Web Services).
en.job4Desc9: Use of Docker for application containerization.
en.job5Title: üöß SOFTWARE DEVELOPER | SUPPORT - SISTEMAS DE GESTAO
en.job5Desc1: Maintenance and development of Java Web programs.
en.job5Desc2: Migration of programs from ERP systems (developed in Cobol) to Java Web.
en.job5Desc3: Full-Stack development in JavaScript and Vue.js (Front-End), Java, SpringBoot, and Hibernate (Back-End)
en.job5Desc4: Creation of reports using the Jasper tool.
en.project1Desc1: The dropcode platform was created for sharing code snippets between your friends and colleagues.
en.project1Desc2:
Developed the platform in Next.js 13, using the new app router.
Deployed the platform on Vercel.
en.project1Desc3:
An API in NodeJS was developed to facilitate interactions with the database. Fastify was used for handling routes, Prisma for simplified database management, while Zod provided secure validation of incoming data.
The API was deployed on Cyclic.
en.project1Desc4:
The database was created in PostgreSQL.
Stored it in Supabase.
